Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip, traces of cream-coloured paint and faint traces of black-painted characters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394145) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394145)
